features: With 2 modes of use, this extra comfortable LATCH equipped Cosco car seat accommodates infants from 5 pounds up to toddlers weighing 40 pounds in rear facing mode and kids up to 65 pounds in forward facing mode. Its compact design also makes it easier to manage through airport security checks
The 5 point harness adjusts easily from the front of the seat and features 5 heights and 3 buckle locations. Fits 3 across in the back seat of most vehicles
Built in side impact protection keeps your little 1 extra secure; Designed to be just the right size, the seat takes up less space while rear facing so parents can have more leg room
Three of these seats can fit side by side in the back seat of most cars, perfect for growing families
With plush padding and premium fabric, this seat gives your child an extra comfy ride; Easy to clean, the fabric car seat cover is machine washable and dryer safe
This car seat meets or exceeds federal, ASTM, and JPMA safety standards and includes a 1 year limited warranty

For more than 70 years, Cosco has been a leading children’s products brand recognized for its dedication to safety and value; From bouncers to car seats, swings to strollers, and high chairs to play yards, Cosco's essential baby products feature solid value and smart design
body.description: The Cosco Mighty Fit 65 DX Convertible Car Seat keeps your child safe in the car all the way from 5 to 65 pounds. With two modes of use, this extra-comfortable LATCH-equipped car seat accommodates your child up to 40 pounds in rear-facing mode and up to 65 pounds in forward-facing mode. The five-point harness adjusts easily from the front of the car seat and features five heights and three buckle locations. Built-in side-impact protection keeps your little one extra secure. Designed to be just the right size, this convertible car seat takes up less space while rear-facing so parents can have more leg room. Three of these child car seats can fit side-by-side in the back seat of most cars, perfect for growing families. With plush foam padding and premium fabric, this seat gives your child an extra-comfy ride. Easy to clean, the fabric car seat cover is machine-washable and dryer-safe. This car seat meets or exceeds federal, ASTM, and JPMA safety standards and includes a one-year limited warranty. For more than 70 years, Cosco has been a leading children’s products brand recognized for its dedication to safety and value. From bouncers to car seats, swings to strollers, and high chairs to play yards, Cosco's essential baby products feature solid value and smart design.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us We keep the village in motion with awesome, essential gear for your kiddos designed with simplicity, affordability, and value in mind.CoscoKids is the trusted brand for every family who sees themselves in us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great on airplane
reviews.reviewText: I got this specifically as a travel car seat for the airplane for my two year old. It worked perfect. Easy to install and take out. my daughter was comfortable and it leaves a good amount of room in between the next seat. She slept the whole way on the plane.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: In terms of cost, I think this is a pretty great, basic car seat. There’s no fancy “bells and whistles” included that some other models may have, but it does have a cup holder, and a headrest that is easily adjustable.We’ve had this car seat for about a year now and it’s held up perfectly. Easy to clean, travel with, and secure into your vehicle. We’ve only ever secured it with the seatbelt.Pros: The Onyx color is lovely, we didn’t want anything too bright or flashy and the color in person matches the picture. It seems comfy, I’ve obviously never used it personally, but my daughter has never seemed to have an issue. Lightweight. Pretty compact in size compared to others, we have a very small vehicle (Chevy Spark) and this fits pretty well without looking very bulky. Although, it doesn’t fit in rear facing position without moving the passenger seat as far up as possible.Cons: The straps twist constantly in the bucke part. I don’t know if I’m doing something wrong, but I can’t seem to stop it from happening.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great buy if you can stomach some inconvenience
reviews.reviewText: Love this car seat for the most part. I have one in each of my cars. It's pretty decent for the money. It's narrow so it takes up less space in my forester, allowing two to ride in the back with the seat. It was a huge upgrade in comfort when we got it when my son was two and is nicely padded. It's pretty easy to take apart and wash, way more so than the graco infant seat I had before (and my son is a puker, so I've done that a lot) and so far it seems to wash well. It does have some drawbacks, however. The buckles are pretty stiff and a challenge to get undone at times. I've had my other one for a year and it doesn't get better with use. There is also a serious learning curve when it comes to installing it rear-facing. The first time is kind of a nightmare, once you get the belt adjusted, it gets much better. It's a challenge to even figure out how to do that however since the instructions for rear-facing seemed to me to be almost non-existent. At a certain point I thought I had made a horrible mistake and inadvertently gotten a forward-facing only seat. I think the forward facing installation was much more thought out, because it has s much easier. The weird thing with this particular color is also that it is getting weird darkish patches as I wash it. Not like stains, but like the dye is washing out. It's starting to look kind of bad. But ultimately it's a very good car seat for the money. I'm not looking to switch any time soon and I have bought two!UPDATE: I've had this seat for about a year now and my little one finally maxed out the rear facing so we flipped him forward facing. WOW. I love this car seat so much more. It is a breeze to install forward facing and fits nicely in both our Enclave and Forester seats. its secure with seat belt or anchors and is still comfortable. If you are buying for a forward facing kid, it is so much more convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mazda cx 5 - fits perfectly
reviews.reviewText: We've been on the hunt for a convertible car seat for my son that won't take up a massive amount of room in my cx5. This car seat fits perfectly!! I'd definitely buy it again for my next!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great "next step" car seat for growing toddler.
reviews.reviewText: We had used a rear-facing "carrier" type car seat from birth to two years, but we reached the point to make a change to car seat for a toddler. While this car seat can be used earlier, we found it perfect for this moment of transition. It was easy to install, softly padded, and the straps are secure and comfortable. The added cup holder was a bonus. I'd buy it again; it's a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and comfy
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to travel with and bring on the plane as our regular carseat weighs 22 pounds and I would be traveling alone with a 2 year old. This is super lightweight and easy to install in the car and on the plane. I like how it has a lot of padding and my 2 year old seems to really be comfortable in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Needs more cushion
reviews.reviewText: What I like:- Easy to install in car once it’s set up: I used this rear facing for my baby when she was 8-10 months old and it was very easy to install it rear facing. The trick is, I used my knee to apply pressure to the seat while I tightened the latch strap and it was very secure, did not move more than an inch side to side and did not slip backwards when baby was inside.- AffordableWhat I did not like:- The cushioning is thin, does not seem comfortable for long trips.- Straps have to be rethreaded to adjust, very inconvenient.- The headrest seems off for some reason, it was slightly crooked even though both sides were adjusted to the same height.I ended up buying a more expensive convertible Graco seat, but I would recommend this one if you are on a budget/if baby is 20+ lbs. I honestly would not feel comfortable putting a newborn in this seat, it is very lightweight and not cushioned enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal for the price - very comfy
reviews.reviewText: I needed a cheap car seat for our 3-week vacation in the states. This was great! We drove all over TN and up to WI and my little guy (3) never moaned or complained. He fell asleep easy in it and seemed to enjoy the ride. Would highly recommend!
Sencilla de instalar y de muy buena calidad
Fácil de instalar, fácil de asegurar al niño, excelente calidad10/10

Me gusto el tamaño y lo facil de instalar. Y el color.Realmente usa un espacio considerable para poder colocar mas sillas o si el auto es muy compacto.Pero no creo que sea apta para un bebé menor de 6 meses al menos pues todavia tendria que adaptar unas sabanitas enrrolladas a los costados de mi bebé para que no quede muy flojo en el asiento.
Es ligera, la usamos no como silla de diario ni para trayectos largos. Se usa en auto de familiares.
Todo perfecto, de las mejores compras que he hecho.
